TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersonalizableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PersonalizableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PersonalizableAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Represents the personalization attribute. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 个性化设置属性， `Personalizable`，应用于需要保存个性化设置信息的公共控件属性。 ASP.NET 自动生成代码，将存在，或者从基础数据存储区检索这些值，当控件在 Web 部件页的 Web 部件区域中。
要将标记为可个性化的属性，必须满足以下要求：
- 属性必须是公共的并且必须具有公共 get 和 set 访问器。
- 该属性必须是读/写属性。
- 该属性必须是不带参数。
- 该属性无法进行索引。
自动生成代码以加载和保存个性化设置数据属性。 支持个性化设置的属性确定基于存在此特性的属性和这一事实属性符合以上所列的约束。
请注意，只读和只写属性不支持个性化。 将此特性应用于只读或只写属性会导致<xref:System.Web.HttpException>所引发。 参数化的属性也会引发<xref:System.Web.HttpException>异常。
如果通过任何特殊的处理，如果不使用此属性的各个属性不在个性化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>使用接口。
有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>代码中的类。 此示例包含一个.aspx 页面，引用名为 Web 部件用户控件`ColorSelector.ascx`。 以下代码是示例.aspx 文件。
[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/Default.aspx#1)]
下面的代码是为`ColorSelector.ascx`控件。
> [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。
[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/ColorSelector.ascx#2)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在内部设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>属性设置为`true`，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>，并<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置为`false`。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isPersonalizable) cil managed

Docs.param: A Boolean value indicating whether the property can be personalized.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此构造函数在内部设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>属性的布尔型参数，值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置为`false`。
此构造函数是很有用，如果你想要将标记为可个性化设置为不可个性化派生类型的基类型上的虚拟属性的派生的类型。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope) cil managed

Docs.param: A indicating the scope of the personalization.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在内部设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>属性设置为`true`，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>属性设置为指定的参数，并且<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置为`false`。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope, bool isSensitive) cil managed
Public Sub New (scope As PersonalizationScope, isSensitive As Boolean)

Docs.param: A indicating the scope of the personalization.
A Boolean value indicating whether the property information is considered sensitive.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在内部设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>属性设置为`true`，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>属性设置为第一个参数指定，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置为指定的第二个参数。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Default As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization. This field is read-only.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 结合使用此字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>方法。
此字段和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.NotPersonalizable>字段具有相同的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>实例被视为相等，如果他们<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置是否相同。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希代码基于属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ICollection GetPersonalizableProperties(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type on which to look for properties.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法返回包含零个或更多的集合<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>对象，其中的每个属性，它是指定的类型的集合中的一个对象标记为可个性化，其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>等于`true`。
`type`参数的类型在其上查找`Personalizable`属性。 例如，您需要传入`"typeof(MyWebPart)"`若要获取`Personalizable`上的属性`MyWebPart`类。

Docs.exception: A public property on the type is marked as personalizable but is read-only.

Public Overrides Function IsDefaultAttribute () As Boolean

Docs.summary: When overridden, returns a value that indicates whether the attribute instance equals the value of the static field.
Docs.returns: if the attribute instance equals the static field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default>字段指示不支持个性化。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsPersonalizable As Boolean
public: property bool IsPersonalizable { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute can be personalized, as established by one of the constructors.
Docs.value: 如果该属性可进行个性化设置;，否则为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值设置的实例时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>创建类。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSensitive As Boolean
public: property bool IsSensitive { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute is sensitive, as established by one of the constructors.
Docs.value: 如果该属性是敏感;否则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此值设置的实例时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>创建类。
此属性控制如何导出的属性值。 如果该属性设置为`true`，它不会导出时控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.NonSensitiveData>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Match(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Match (obj As Object) As Boolean

Docs.param: The to be compared to the current instance.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current instance of and the specified have the same property value.
Docs.returns: if the two attributes have the same value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法具有相同的属性匹配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>值。

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default>字段具有相同的值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Personalizable As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此特性实例都有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置为`false`。

Docs.summary: Gets the enumeration value for the class instance, as set by one of the constructors.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此值设置的实例时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>创建类。
此属性控制当属性值是保存和加载，具体取决于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>页属性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SharedPersonalizable As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization with a shared scope. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此特性实例都有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置为`false`。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly UserPersonalizable As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization in scope. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此特性实例都有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>属性设置为`false`。
